import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router, Route } from '@angular/router'; import { Subscription } from 'rxjs/internal/Subscription'; import { ProductServiceService } from '../../Services/product-service.service'; import { NgModel } from '@angular/forms'; import { UserserviceService } from '../../Services/userservices.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent { private id:number = 0; public loginstatus:boolean = false; private productdata:any = {}; public product:any; private application:any; private category:any; constructor(private ProductServiceService:ProductServiceService,private useServices:UserserviceService, public route:ActivatedRoute,private router:Router,){ this.route.paramMap.subscribe(params =>{ this.id=Number( params.get('id')); }) this.loginstatus=useServices.getuserloginstatus(); this.productdata=ProductServiceService.getProduct(); this.application=ProductServiceService.getapplication(); this.category=ProductServiceService.getcategory(); this.product=this.productdata.find((product: any) => product.Id === this.id) } }
